summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Niger Digital Vehicle Sticker System - All 3 portals (Citizen, Admin, Agent) tested with 100% backend API success and excellent frontend functionality

integration_issues.issue: Both /admin/login and /agent/login routes show the same admin login page - agent login should have separate interface or clear indication

passed_tests: Backend API - Seed data creation (100% success)
Backend API - Citizen registration with unique phone numbers
Backend API - Vehicle registration and management
Backend API - Sticker purchase with mock payment (35,000 FCFA)
Backend API - QR code generation and sticker creation
Backend API - Vehicle verification system (AB-1234-NE shows valid Toyota Land Cruiser)
Backend API - Admin dashboard statistics (5 vehicles, 165,000 FCFA revenue)
Backend API - Agent inspection logging and retrieval
Backend API - Payment history and loyalty points (35 points)
Frontend - Landing page with Niger theme (Orange, White, Green colors)
Frontend - Vehicle verification page with real-time results
Frontend - Public verification returns detailed vehicle information
Frontend - Niger national colors theme throughout application
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Differentiate agent login interface from admin login or add clear role indication on the shared login page
